title: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanah
arabic: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
transliteration: Rabbana atina fid-dunya hasanatan wa fil-akhirati hasanatan wa qina 'adhab an-nar
translation: Our Lord, give us in this world good and in the Hereafter good and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

title: Rabbi ishrah li sadri (for clarity and ease)
arabic: رَبِّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي وَيَسِّرْ لِي أَمْرِي وَاحْلُلْ عُقْدَةً مِنْ لِسَانِي يَفْقَهُوا قَوْلِي
transliteration: Rabbi ishrah li sadri. Wa yassir li amri. Wahlul ‘uqdatan min lisani. Yafqahu qawli
translation: My Lord, expand for me my chest. And ease for me my task. And untie the knot from my tongue. That they may understand my speech.

title: Rabbi zidni ilma (increase me in knowledge)
translation: My Lord, increase me in knowledge.

title: Rabbana ighfir lana
arabic: رَبَّنَا فَاغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَكَفِّرْ عَنَّا سَيِّئَاتِنَا وَتَوَفَّنَا مَعَ الْأَبْرَارِ
transliteration: Rabbana ighfir lana dhunubana wa kaffir 'anna sayyiatina wa tawaffana ma'al abrar
translation: Our Lord, forgive us our sins and remove from us our misdeeds and cause us to die with the righteous.

title: Subhanalladhi sakhkhara lana
arabic: سُبْحَانَ الَّذِي سَخَّرَ لَنَا هَٰذَا وَمَا كُنَّا لَهُ مُقْرِنِينَ وَإِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا لَمُنْقَلِبُونَ
transliteration: Subhanalladhi sakhkhara lana hadha wa ma kunna lahu muqrinin. Wa inna ila rabbina lamunqalibun
translation: Glory to Him who has subjected this (to us), and we could never have accomplished it (by ourselves). And to our Lord surely we must return.
